153a1(1): tshogasas da ga gan po rkye pa na pa de bzhi tshugs par bya'o// lam dpas des ya kya ses rabs sem pan rgyas pa'i gzu 'dzin du gas pa kyi zhen/  / 
153a2(1): tha rgog byed gso gdes byed pa 'gab par byed/ ngagi nog pas sun byed de/ gnog pa de yang mdapa 'di/ gdabyas pa du byed dri bral ning/ gdag dang ba dag 'od gsas dang / gas ngar nyid byed cing macad byed pad
153a3(1): byang chub zhing 'ong ba shes te/ ma thar nyid byed ci 'byung byed de/ la gnam mkhan 'dra bar shes pas na/ ga ti 'a da gis brjod pa ni sems bya dbyal pa'i gzugs kyis bstad/ 'jas dpal de lta na sem
153a4(1): can dmyal ba'i gzugs ting nge 'dzi nang tu rtogs par bya'o// 'jamadapal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas dud 'gro'i skye gnasakyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin tu rtogs par bya zhe na de dper na ji ltar sprin gi gzu
153a5(1): gag gal don sna rdzogs byung ba dag/ de la 'don yod phyidakyi mangs pa dag mongs par byed// de bzhin sems kyang byed na/ 'i phying/ gad gi gzugs dang mtshungs nas nga/ dud mtshwa'i byeg nas rnan
153a6(1): pra nA~M/ nas sa sa pas kyang bstod// las na sbru ba'i ring ban dang / khrung byed sa can nyid byed par shes/ nge 'dzin na pa brjod pa na/ da 'gro'i gzunas kyis bslad pa yon/ 'phalas
153b1(1): bar bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'dod chags ting nge 'dzidang tu rtogs par bya'o// yongs su rtog las 'dod chags 'byung // rtog pa de yang 'byung ba byed/ 'byung ba byed la gnas pa myed de'i gnas kyang rnyed
153b2(1): myi 'gyur da/ gnas byed gnas pa yod byin pas// 'dod chags nam mkha' 'dra ba yin/ byis pa smad par gyur rnams kyis// kun nas nyon mongs yongs su brtags kun nas nyon mongs myed chos te// 'dod chags zhes bya'i
153b3(1): byin gyis brjod/ phyogs bcu dag tu bcal byas kyang // de'i dngos po rnyed myi 'gyur// 'dod chags dngos po myed pa la// byis pa rmongs pa 'jigs byed de/ 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i 'du shes tsam/ de dag la ni bde ba byed/ ji ltar skyes / 
153b4(1): kha la dga'amakha' la 'jigs par 'du shes nas/ bsgrag cing bdag grisra nam mkha' ni// myi mthong bya zhes 'bros byed kyang // nam mkha' kun tu khyab pas na// su yang de las myi mthar te// byis pa bslad par gyur de rnams kyis
153b5(1): byin ci log tu rnams par brtags// de ltar chos rnams mkhal 'dra/ par// shes par ma gyur da byis pa rnams// dngos po myed pa/ 'dod chags la// yongs su spang bar mngon par 'dod/ 'dod chags nam mkha
153b6(1): 'dra bas na// su yang de las 'grol ba myed// grol zhing rnam gro phun sum tshogs// chos rnams myang ngan 'das dang 'dra/ sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang // 'dren pa gang dag bzhugs pa/ ga
153b7(1): rlag 'byung 'gyur rdzogs sangs rgyas / de kun pyod yul 'dod chags yin// 'dod chags stong par shes gyur nga na// chags las 'grel ba g.yo yang byed/ gang dag chags la 'jigs 'du shes// de dag chags la grol byar nga/ 
153b8(1): yang myed pa'i mtha' 'di ni/ 'dod chags mtha' ste 'od gsal zhing // mtshan ma myed la rtag mnye par// byang chub snying po nga yis mthong // dngos por 'du shes sems can kang // de dag 'dod chags 'bri bar 'gyur// yod
153b9(1): ba myin pa yongs brtags pas// de dag gis ni spong ba brtags// bdag gis 'dod chags spang bya zhes/ de 'dra 'du shes skyes nas nas ni// de la spangs shes brjod par bya// 'gro ba 'di dag 'du shes tsam// 'dod chags mtha' ni bsam/ 
153b10(1): yas te/ mtho' de 'jigs pa myed pas na// yang dag mtha' dang de mnyam pas// de las grol bar ma rtogs shing // gal te chags las grol gyu ra na// stong pa nyid las grol bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dang na stong pa nyid
154a1(1): de nyid nyis su yod ma yin// 'di slar skye ba byed pa la// de dag skye bar rnam rtogs pas/ byis pa nyis su shes rnams la / ngas ni spong ba rab tu bstand// 'dod chags de ni bskye myed na// 'dod chags zhes bya'i
154a2(1): byang du brjod 'bying rnams kun tu rags byed pas ca ga bying sa su yang gas pa byed pa/ na 'dod chags chags pa byed shes shing // mtha' las 'das pa'i stong mtho // 'dod chags rnam par bzhig pa'i phyir/ mthar pa ma khas
154a3(1): pas kyi mthong ngo //  'dod chags sangs rgyas chos mtshungs shing/ bya ngan 'das pa 'drar shes nas// rdul dang bral ba ma ti nge 'dzin// 'dod chags smras ni ngas pas nang to// 'jam dpal de ltang ma byang chub sems dpas 'dod
154a4(1): chags ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de ya jisam na byang chub sems dpas zhe sdapa ting nge 'dzin tu rtogs par bya zhe na / spong las de sdang kun tu 'byung / gnyon mongs pa yang byed las bye/ khangs
154a5(1): byed pa las 'byung ba'i bdan/ gamang po tshogs las skyes pa yin chub po ni stsa las zhe sdang ni/ gdug nod lta bu mab tu 'byungs sgra ni nga ro'i rang bzhin pas/ shin tu sod pa ma yin no// ji ltar tshogs na
154a6(1): gtsub shing dang gang/ gtsub bstand las ni mye byung ste// tshogs dang bral bar gyur na ni// de na mye yang yod myin ltar// de bzhin yid tu myi 'ong ba'isgra las zhe sdang gsog 'byung ba'i// gsog kyi sgra las yongs brtags nad// de la
154a7(1): no snang brnyed kyi 'gyur// zhe sdang sgra las ma 'byung zhing // nang na'ang gnas pa ma yin la/ zhe sdang phyi rol nas 'ongs te// byung ba myed pas gsog yin nor// rgyu rnams yan tshun 'dus pa las// zhe sdang kun tu 'byung ba yin// phran
154a8(1): drun bral bar byu da ni/ de ni snang rnyed kyi 'gyur// ji lta ni dang 'om la// skyes dus brgyal te sru gajig su// bsrub pa byas pas rkyen rnams las// ma ni kun tu 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin yi du gyi zad pa'i// sprul pa/ 
154a9(1): ne sdang galog 'thung zhing / yongs su brtags pa sa de'i gnas la/ byi las pa dag rab tu gapar/ gsun tags pa zhe sdang ni// shin tu langs byed nga sa / shes pas na/ tid 'dzin ni sa 'tshod pa ni
154b1(1): ga nga la na na nga bdag 'an na nyid pa brten // chos kyi kyis dang 'dra shes pas// desan 'dzin ce bstan/ 'das dpa'i spyad na de
154b2(1): 'di dad du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpas de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas ti mug ting nge 'dzin tu rtogs par bya zhe na/ 1/ ma rig pa las ti mug 'byung / nga/ ma rig pa yang yod ma yin/ gang na ti mug yod byin pa/ n+ya/ de na
154b3(1): gang yang rmongs pa myed// rmongs myed sems can rmongs gyurd cing // chags myed rags par 'du shes pa// ji ltar byis pas nam mkha' la// mdud pa 'ong la gaspog bzhin no// yod pa ma yin chos rnams la// kun nas nyon
154b4(1): mongs rnam brtags pa/ byis pa rnams kyi 'di mtshar te// mchog tu shin tu bya ba dga'// ji ltar skyes bu la ya zhig/ nam mkha' la ni 'jal byed cing / ga bskal pa bye bar gzhal byas kyang // de la phung po n+ya rnyed ltar/ 
154b5(1): de bzhin rmongs pas byis pa'i/ sngon gyi mtha' ni bsam gyi khyab/ da gti mug phung por 'byung myed de// des ni ci yang bkang ba myedarje ltar nam mkha' gzhal byas kyang // de la sngon gyi mtha' myed cing
154b6(1): yin pa/ ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig/ smad la stong pa bud byas shing // bzhan nas spud pa rnyongs pa na// de'i nang na rnyed byin ltar// de bzhina'i dod pa sdud 'dra ba// kun tu rmongs pas dpyod par byed// de ni ngoms par gyi/ 
154b7(1): 'gyur te// phyir zhing 'dod pa 'tshil bar byed// gti mug yod pa sbyin zhes marjod// rtsa pa myed cing dngos po myed// rtsa pa myed cing gnas kyang byed// des na ti mug zad pa myed// 'di ltar ti bug byi zad pas/ da de'i mahA
154b8(1): ma rnyed kyi 'thu// de phyir sems can thos s+ho// med par bya ba ngas kyi nus// gal te dpe tsam brjod byan// bskas pa bye ba bsam byas su// nga'i tshe ni gnas byung nga la// nyin cig bzhin du nyid de la// stong gsum se/ 
154b9(1): na ji snyed pa// thams cad bya ngan pazla bya zhing // thams cad de ltar byas kyang ni// sems can khams la zad pa myed// ti mug gi ni skyid pa'i khams// sems can khams la mtshan nyid byed// / gdis
156a1(1): na// lag se 'a na /  #sa kyi bya / khrig na/  sa bye pa []
156a2(1): ste/ dong pa pa na 'das med// gang thag des cad byed pas// de'i 'byung bskyed kyi 'byung// 'byung ba yod pa ma yinan// skye ba yod par ga la 'byung// gti ga skyes pa ma yin pa/ de
156a3(1): byed ci 'dra zhig/ sangs rgyas yu yang de dang 'dus gas rang dab byed shes ma// chos rnams thams cad nyis su byed/  ting 'dzin nga zhi ba brjod pa ni/ gti mug sgra yis ral dru ba spyang / 
156a4(1): gang sa pa yis mnyam nyid shes pade ni de rang ti mug mnyam/ de dag thams cad mnyam shes nas/  ting 'dzin de yang zhes par shes 'jam dbul de ltar na ti mu g+sa ting nge 'dzi rab tu rtogs
156a5(1): bar bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na/ byang chub seM dpas kyi dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin tu rtogs par bya zhe na/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i rtags gang dpen zhe sdang pyod pa'i ge yol ba dang // ti mun
156a6(1): spyod pa'i gang yin pa/ thams cad ting 'dzind shes par gis// nyon mongs kun gyi bsgrub pa ni/ ting 'dzind yin par mos par gyis// brdzun dang yang dag ma yin par/ thams cad de bzhin bsgom par gyis// 'jam
156a7(1): dpal de ltar na phyi dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin su rtogs par bya'o// 'jamadapal de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' duge ba thams cad ting d+he tu rtogs par bya zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi ji snyed dge' na sems dang pyodapa
156a8(1): rab ba des dge sa rnams ti de yi rlogs par bya'o/  sa sa ga sa nga byang chub sems dpas 'das byas dmam pa de 'ams sa bya kyi sa su gyi sa
156b1(1): ded grang bas gnas byas na/ gzhas kri byed pa'i dag na tu byed/ de lta ting 'dzin shes pam gyis// dpag tu bye par shes man/ lus byed dam pa yod byin pas gting 'arjid du ni pa brjod rtso las
156b2(1): ma pa do/  lus byas mapa ma na 'o//  di 'di // rgya chub ba na mamam
156b3(1): 'dzi nad tu rtogs par bya'o// chos 'di rabazhin pas na/ de la grangs ni yod ma yin// ma rig pa yis/ bsgrub ldan pa// ting nge 'dzinang gi bsgrub par bstan// 'dus byas kun ldo 'i rjod phyed cing / bsgrub pa bye lnga
156b4(1): shes nas ni// sems can gang dag brjod la chags// de dag rnams la de ltar bstand/ 'jam dpal de ltar na 'dus ma byas ting nge 'dzind du rtogs par bya'o// tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra bas
156b5(1): sa pa rgya khyab pa lasun pa 'di bgad pa na// byang chub sems dpal dbu khri nyis srong gis kyi skye ba'i cho sa bzod pa thos nyi lta bye ba khrag zhig tu phrag bdun phra rtsa nyi kyi na byed pa ban
156b6(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// dge slong sum tshwadrug stong ni/ med pa byed par zag pa rnams las sems rnamabar grol lo// dge slong ma drug stong gis nyis po rgyas kyang / bla na byed pa/ 
156b7(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu su sems skyed do// dge byed sa pa rgya 'dus gis kyang / blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng chum sem sa babyed do//  ge bsnyed la sa pa phrag pa ni dang / nyis 'dus kyi srung / tha
156b8(1): bye pa dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chul bu sems byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpa'i gnon nung byu pas/ 'di skad kyis gsoyod to// byang chub sems dpas da pa lan ga nang dag bcung rjes de
156b9(1): gis ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi mying mthos na// chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'dod pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / gang zag myigs pa'i lta ba can rnams kyis thul da par dkal po dang / 
157a1(1): canan ga da'i can pa dang bco mams ca kyi dzin cig rtogs par byas padang / byon ba tham ca spongs phram sems pa bams pa mtsham sa sa
157a2(1): chung pa dang / mamasatsam med par 'byur ba dang / spyod pa bams das mtshan nyid ga rgyagapa shing / pa ma 'dadas pa dan pa gnas mun pas mchim pa 'tho ba 'ang 'gyum sa ni
157a3(1): nad rnams kyi rkyong bcom ldan 'das kyis ba stand tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nung gyur phra la 'di skad ces/ ba gal sa mang to// 'jag dpal de'i phyir/ 
157a4(1): sems pananas kyi nyod snga zung bshad do// 'jam dpal zhon su dar gyu pas 'a bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin mo// zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spang ma nyed pa dang / bcom ldan
157a5(1): kyos gnon par byed do// 'jam dpal 'od zer 'byur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gi gzi'i brjid zil kyis gnond par byed do/ 
157a6(1): 'jam dpal yul bstonod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa 'bod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag gi bzi'il brjid gzil gyis gnod par byed rngon rang ya ba ng+gA
157a7(1): rus pa dod pa nas bya ma'i ting pa 'dzi 'dzan/ nga pa 'dzin rna ma 'an/ byang chub sems dpal mchong 'jug pa thams cad kyi 'ad gas dang / snre sdang dag ni thus mi bad byed do// 'amamadapa 'ong ci
157a8(1): ma byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ tid de 'azhid de tho'o na byang chul sems dpa' bdus rgyas kyi rnamams cad 'od zer gyis sdong bar byed do// 'jam da'a' rjem thams cad kyi brjod pa zhes bya ba'i
157b1(1): de ting nge 'dzind de thob na/ byang chub sems dpal sang sa kyi chos bsta na pa thams cad 'dzind cing gzhan la yang bstond par byed do// 'jam dpal seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da yod de/ ting nge la
157b2(1): 'dzin de thob nabyang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du spras mngon par go bar byed do// 'jam dpal dga' ba dang / tshim pa thams cad yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting bye 'dzin pa yod de/ ting nge 'chi dang
157b3(1): de thob na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa sna 'tshogs yang dag par 'gu bar byed do// 'jam dpal blta bas mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzidang yod de/ ting nge 'dzind de thos na
157b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' lta ba dang mnyand par chog myi shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal yon bsam gis myi mkhyab pa'i 'byung nas/ te shes rab kyi yul rin po che'i 'byung zhud/ rgyun cig pa nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya pa'i ting re
157b5(1): 'dzin da yod de thos na / byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ba sanas// ba dang gsems can rnams 'phrul bar byed do// ti de 'di nyi ma phyi na de thob da/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bskad dang brjod pa dang brda thams cad
157b6(1): rtogs shi yi ge thams cad kyis yi ge gcig tu bstand pa dang ye ge cig gis yi ge thams cad pastonod par byed do/ 'jam dpa' las kyi rnam par sbyin pa las 'byung ba bsod nam sa dang dge ba'i
157b7(1): tsha ba thams cad martogs shing bstond par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind yod de/ ting nge 'dzind de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' cad kyi sgra'am snyoms papa bzhugs te/ yi ge cig tsam yang brjod par sems can thams cad/ 
157b8(1): kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gi sgra dang / nyan thob kyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgra thos par byed do/ 'jab dpal gzugs thams cad bas
157b9(1): mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/  ting nge 'dzin de tho na/ byang chub sems dpal gzugs mtha' yas yA la smrab lal 'dug pa khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ 'ja' das rlom
158a1(1): sa snang sabs ya / de chos yan 'das pa 'ams rnamapas 'di/ dang bang /  ldan 'das padas kyis kyi rnam mas 'dis 'dra
158a2(1): nga brjod pa'i khyad pa khra tshums la gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maN+Dal pa na / 'jam dpal khyod slo'i ma pas gyis shishi 'jam dpal gi sa ga 'khyod par bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang/ 
158a3(1): sang dag de nung ma mchis pa dang / the tsom mchis pa'i sems kyis chos rang kyi nas grangs 'di bstod pa dang / 'chang pa dang / klog pa da / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya chen yang dag pa
158a4(1): rab tu bston bgyid pa de tshe 'di nyid la gdon gyi 'tshal bar spobs/ pa 'thob par de bar re bar bgyi steg spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa rgya che ba dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / myi brjed
158a5(1): pa'i spobs pa dang / spongs pa sna tshogs 'thob pang re bar bgyi'o/ de ni sems can thams cad la re bzhe 'grus pa ma mchis pa'i sems su 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du ne/ 
158a6(1): bci cim du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sprul pa de ni 'apyod pa 'di nyid dang rjes su 'brel pa lags pa'i sun du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'jam dpal gno nur gru dang pa la legapa
158a7(1): nas byas byon te/ 'jam dpal chen pa // pa 'dzig pa se rgya na mas myod ba po sa par su babyed do// 
158b1(1): rung chos kyin pa grangs 'di la byi kyin rlob par myi byed do zhes/ bdud sdig can la bka' la nga zang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bam lad pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni byin kyis brlabs byed pas byin
158b2(1): kyis brlabs pa 'dzin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byind kyis brlabs myed pas/ byind kyis 'drabs pa yin/ 'jab dpal de'i phyir nges bdud sdig can la 'di skad dubacos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin kyis rlon
158b3(1): par myi byed de zhes smras so// 'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos thams cad byind kyis brlabs myed pas byin kyis rlabs pa dang / tha dad du dbyed myed pa dang / brjod du myed pa dang / mtshan nyid myed
158b4(1): pa dang / bsnyad du myed pa dang / basmar myed pa dang / gnyis su myed pa dang / gnyis dang bral ba dang / de yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa dang / de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan
158b5(1): nyid yin pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig de dang / chos kyi rtse grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na rab tu spyod par gyurd cig/ de nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bden pa'i byidad kyi rlabs dri mdzad
158b6(1): sa na sa dga' boms kyi mang po rgyad khrigani stong 'ang yin da/ chos kyirnams grangs 'di ga yon pa de dge na mnyam ma
158b7(1): na kyi'i kun nam na mas kyi rnam grangs 'di grang shin da shing / sa 'ang/ kun nub par gyis kyi/ zhan dang su sa rgya da yang das ya ba tu ba
158b8(1): phyi zhe na/ bran dgul po de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ kun nas blan chub kyi dbyings 'bumasas ma zugs su chud nas/ sems can rnams pa chos kyi phung po brgyad khro ba ni sbom pa sonod pam sa
158b9(1): nga byar ma/ no ba par mi sa no// sa kyin ma grangs 'di lem su pa 'grang pas gas pamasasu / ses pa ba dus pam ma
159a1(1): 'das kyis de skad ces bka'as khang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dri ma byed ze'i snying po dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu dad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / ng+ga dang / mye da / 
159a2(1): rnam yin dang dri bar brtsam pa'i 'jig rkyen yid rangs ze/  bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs gos mngon par 'god nan/ 'phags la dkon mchog brtsegs pa rtson tha'i chos kyi rnam grangs spong zag brgya pa
159a3(1): 'phags pa kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gang gi mkhan po 'dzin na gyi rnga dang / su ren dra po de dang / zhus cen gri na
159a4(1): ba de ye shes sdes nus te/ gtan pha' bas 'gags la dkon mchog 'gyegs pa chen po chos kyi nas grangs spong zag brgya la khas da sa pags bye da gcer smral
159a5(1): ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdor la rnabs po dpa po// / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig nag bco tha
159a6(1): ldan 'das rgyal po'i yang/ bya rnom thong ba'i A sde 'a chen po thams cad kyang / nang dbang chen po mang sa ma brgyad gzhan ya me gci gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' semaldan pa'i
159a7(1): byabs pa la sasogs pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la bsngo sdod pa khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu dang dr-i/ thabs cig tu bzhugs/ 
159a8(1): tede'i 'khor 'dus pa nyid du bu 'od gzho nu gyu da pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par 'gyum sa de 'jug pa'i bste nga las langs nas/ p+la gos phrag la gcig tu gaper te/ gsus so g.yas pa'i ga pas rlos gtsun
159b1(1): lamarus su dang bya mas byas byaya mthas/ mu ga ma hA hA/ byas kwa / lnga bas ma tra sa sa
159b2(1): mam kyil gyi sa so spyo sa ma 'as spongs pa bya'os bya bas sa 'am so she nyi
159b3(1): kyi 'od phreng dang kha dog 'dres la ma 'chis pa'i 'od zer dang / rgya chung ngu'i 'od zer dang / rgya chen po'i 'od zer dang / rnam pa bdag pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer dang / 'drim mchis pa'i 'od zer
159b4(1): dang / shin tu dri ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od zer dang / rigs kyis 'phyel pa'i 'od zer dang / gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / mtha' mchis pa'i 'od zer dang
159b5(1): shin mtha' ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu mtshad pa mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / grangs kyi mtshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu grangs kyi tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang
159b6(1): myur ba 'od zer dang / shin tu myur pa'i 'od zer dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / gnas ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od zer dang / snang bar bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / mos par bgyid
159b7(1): pa'i 'od le dang / pha ro bong tu phyind par bgyid pa'i 'od ze dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa 'od zer das / g.yol pa ma mchis pa'o 'od zer dang drang po'i 'od zer dang /  dpag tu ma gyis pa la kun so

159b9(1): ser po dang / dbang po dang / dkar po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od ze ra dang / kha dog leb rgan gi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang chu shel gyi kha don gyi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / nam kha'i kha dog gi mtshan nyid

164b5(1): byin gyis sems can grangs gzigs nas/ spu khung kun nas 'od zer sna tshogs gtong // 'od zer meng po de dag re re yang so sor 'khor ma pa dag gis rab tu bskor// sems can rnams kyi/

164b7(1): gang po dag las ni// mdo sde 'di ni thos par gyu dad pa 'iyin/ pa la 'od zer khyad par 'phags/ pag yod/ 'khod na bye ba brgya bcu grangs snyed yod pa/ sngon kau sangs rgyas dag la tshigs
164b8(1): bcad gcig/ bsngags pas de phyir 'od zer 'di 'grub po// pa la 'od zer mya ngan myed pa yod// 'khor ni khrag khrig brgya/ bcu bsnyed yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa cig gzung pas/ 
164b9(1): de phyir 'od zer 'di ni grub bya yin// ra la 'od zer rnam dag mchog yod de 'khor ni bye ba brgya bcu grangs snyed yod// ting 'dzin gcig ni yongs su gzung bas na/ de phyir 'od zer 'di ni grub
164b10(1): yin// 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas mtshan// khyad par 'phags pa zhes bya 'byung / sangs rgyas de ni 'jig rten na/ sku tshe'i mtshad ni myed par gzhugs/ dang por mngon par sangs rgyas
165a1(1): so pabyed 'ong tu 'dus pa'i/ grangs ni zag 'is rgyab na byed/ gni nyi ni labya bar 'jug pa de'i ba bangs tha'o// tshwa che dag ni 'didas ca/ lu gi rgya ba de'i bying/ sgral mos zhes bya ba
165a2(1): byab sargyas batsha nan ldan/ chub du nas rgya 'oT byad pa dag ni brag 'dres pas/ yong bdag ni dga' yar 'gyur/ non che rgya pa mas// sa ci'i byin dad sa zhen zhis da'od mchog dag ni gsus po / 
165a3(1): go du ba la skyes par byas// rgyal po de la byed pam sa// mchog du gyu paji byed pa// dodag mam yadasus man/  'dun sa ma sa/ byed pas 'ams dig /  pa nan pa byed pa/ ded
165a4(1): thams cang bu tun// sdod gang can pa ga dag dang /  ljon shing rgya kro dan dang /  ljon shing kyed yug dang / ljon ga su dum pa re dang / de ston shing ha pra sa tra dang / ljon ga ni drug dang sngon shing mya ngar 'chang la
165a5(1): de dag grangs ni so yod yang 'a lcigabye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu yod/ galjon shing mang po di dag kyang // dbyad dang dkun ni 'dra bar yang / kame tog 'bras bu/ yas gdag/ kha dog dag ni gas le zhing rgyas// dri mchog dang Tha
165a6(1): rab tu 'bru zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'dul// dge slong dag ni ji snyend pa// lus kyi kha dog ser dang 'drar/ de dag thams cad kun kyang ni/ sngon shing dag ni drung na// gzugs ni rab tu thob par 'gyur/ 
165a7(1): de dede bzhin gshegs pa der/ rgyal po yab dang sras rnams la gzhan yang 'khor ni mang po la// shin tu thugs ni rtse ba'i phyir// rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer mdo// de dag la ni rab tu bstan / rgyal po des ni thos gyur nas/ 
165a8(1): sems ni rab tu dga' sam 'gyur ra// gtsigs su bcad pa tshad myed pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod// gzhan yang rgyal po chen po des// rin po che'i gdugs dam pa/ bye ba phrag ni brgya bcu snyed
165a9(1): 'dun pa chu na sa na/ mayun nga 'gyud// da ni du drams pa'i/ de sa
165b1(1): na gyi 'jams na tu 'o me ma tos/ 'od zer de dag de rjes kyas shing pag cad rgyan rdzong bar byed// 'ad ze de dag ras gas bya mas// nyi bla da rje srid kyis gnod// gnan yang ring
165b2(1): pa/ sa ma kya sa 'i dge ga 'ad zla ni ldan chag na sa ldan/ bsan pa
165b3(1): rnaM/ khA 'di skad rnam pa lnga lachog sa 'byin da mu tig rin cer 'dra 'a dag ga spel sa thag tu rnag par brgya dad/ 'di lta bu'i 'azugs dag gis na bskyed mos 'chab ni kun tu g.yogs da ga de'i 'asteng du gzhan yang ni
165b4(1): gsul na dang ni pad ma a ti thug ta ka btang ba zung zhes ni bya ba dang pang ma ngul bar dang 'das sngon po la sogos dang / de bzhin rnam pa snga rdzogs kyini gabad pa'i gdugs ni tshad byed
165b5(1): re re thams cad kun kyang ni// rin cen 'dra pa 'tsham par byas// gzhan yang gser gyi skud pa las da/ byas pa'i gos dag gis kyang ni/ ma de dag tu rab byas nas// de'i steng du khyad par g.yogs
165b6(1): gzhad yung can shin rin cen khri gser dag las ni rkang byas pa// de'i grangs kyang bye ba phrag/ brgyad bcu bsnyed ni rab tu bshams// / rin cen khri ni de dag ya/ khab dang dag las byasa'i// bstan ni bye ba phrag brgyad bcur/ 
165b7(1): de'i snyisteng cu rab brgyan to// de'i tshen sems can ki ra srid pa'i rtse mo man cad kyang ni / thams cad der ni 'dug 'gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa de las ni/ mdo sde 'di ni rab tu mnyand// wA dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ma
166a1(1): kyis kyang / byang chub chen por smon du lam btan/ lba dang sa klu dang lha ma yin/ de yis rdzogs pa thams cad kyang // yongs su dang pa'i sems kyis ni// bye tog man da ra ba dang / mu tig rin chen la/ 
166a2(1): gas pa'o// char 'bab mchod parab khyas// de'i mim gnan ya // ga chen mthu dang gzi'i ldan pa/ kye thag na cun cu byed sardo sde ldan nathos pas na// rab tu dga' pa'i sems byed dog/ byang rgya
166a3(1): de yung yang bstan pa/ de'i chen gzhan yang ni// brgya byin lnga'i dbang po dang // tshangs pa 'khyor dang bcas pa yang / bye ba phrag ni brgyad bcu snyed// 'od zer rab chu ba stond pa yin mdo sde 'di ni thos
166a4(1): bas na// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyed nas/ byang chub tu/ ga ni sems kyang skyed// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur zhes rdo byang chub tu ni lung yang bstan da// de'i tshe na gzhan yang ni
166a5(1): bAni gyi gakhram khrig thAg/ brgyad bcu snyed ni 'dus pa dngamado rje 'din thos pas na// byang chub tshun sems skyen pa lub bstan ya yang thob par 'gyur / de'i chen gzhan yang na
166a6(1): gses 'da' rgyal po bye ba phrag/ brgyad bcu snyed ni 'dus pa dag/ mdo lde nan thos las na// sdom pa lnga ni rab bsrungs te// lung bsnyen pa yang thob par 'gyur dang bye/ de'i men gzhan yang ni 'dri ba'i rgyas
166a7(1): po bye ba phrag/ brgyad bcu snyed ni 'dus pa dag/ mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na gyu/ rol mo brgyad stong rnams byas te/ sgra snyan dag ni rab phyung nas// bcom ldan de la phyag byas pas/  lung bstan pa yang / 
166a8(1): thob par 'gyur// de'i chen gzhan yang ni// gnod sbyin rgyal po khrag khrig snyed// mdo sde 'di ni thos bras na sangs rgyas ye shes dag la ni/ shin tu dad pa ba skyes par 'gyur// de dag thams cad
166a9(1): kun gyis kyang // byang ba chub lung bstan thob bur 'gyur// zla 'od 'di ltar shes par gis// de tshe 'argyal po sgra mos pas// mchod pa rnam pa sna 'tshogs kyis / bcoM ldan de la mchod
166b1(1): sman min thags kyis so// den khyod bdag rgyad yin no// khyod na sngon 'das sas kyi// me lda can no thos pa'i rgyas// de ltabs ning 'di yang // 'di nyid blangs sa rgya da/ 
166b2(1): ngan 'das par 'ad// kyang sa dra ba mig gas gdam pa sa kyi ma da po dag/ nas yang 'angon rgya kyi/ chos kyi bab dang pa 'di ga la/ dang pani mim sa ni gang byed pa 'di
166b3(1): 'i mdo sde dag she brgya chem yang dag pa spyonod pas nus// ma 'ongs mdo sde 'don gang ba nod pa// des ni nga'i chos 'dzin srung par byed// de ni 'dron mang 'ded pa'i ded dpor 'dra / ring med gnye sa 'jings
166b4(1): srung ba zhes kyang bya// ma 'ongs dus che mdo 'di gang thos nas// skad cig tu mos pa skyed byed pa/ de ni sangs rgyas byind kyisar+b+ba 'as byang ba yin// 'jam dpal phyid kyis brlabs par rig par bya'o/ 
166b5(1): des ni sangs rgyas mang po mthong 'gyur bas// gsang pa'i chos pa tad shes rab rno bar 'gyur// gang dag sems dres nyin des nga shi rtag tu sangs rgyas rim 'gro byed la brtsod/ bdag byed
166b6(1): sa ning byams subathong bskyed pades ni bde rje 'disos par 'gyur// gang nigatag su kyi ge'i sems 'an ni rnyed la 'du ning mchog kyi shes pa dang / rab dben nas
166b7(1): mos par myi 'gyur ba/ das ni mdo sde 'di la mos myi 'gyur gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod dang / dam chos zab mo legs par rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas yang dag ye shes yid shes pa/ 
166b8(1): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig sems g.yeng dad pa'i sems myed cing // rtag tu srog gcod kaduya par rab dga' dang / 'dod pa'i yul rnams kyi ni bran byed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la/ 
166b9(1): mos na 'gyur// gang zhig rtag tu 'gon gnas rab mos shing // gcig pu dben par 'dug cing sems zhi dang // rnyed dang gnyen la mngon par zhen myed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur
166b10(1): gang zhig grogs ngan dag gi rjes 'brang zhing ga bdag dang gzhan gi dge' ba 'jig byed dang / tshul khrims ting 'dzind dag ni cher nyams pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos myi 'gyur// gang zhig yid
167a1(1): gagin tun pa dag cin gcag tu shes rab mchog de rnam pa byed du/ gdagel ba'i shes dag gis ni rab bsrungs pa// des ni mdo rje 'di la mos par 'gyur// ga nig mnyes kyi khyim la yag chags zhing / 
167a2(1): me tog sheb byi 'das byed dang gabrems spang byed ci chub pa / deni me ste 'di la mos kyi 'gyung // gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgya sadri dun zhing// dpe pa'i cho sa mchog la mol pa dang / byang chub cwo zhing g.yo sgra myed gyu
167a3(1): thar 'dod ma rdo rje 'dis pol bar 'gyur gang nig drung ma bu mo phred dgas shing // gos gsog lnga 'tshogs dag gis rab brgyan nas/ brtag tu de dag ldan cin gyi smon pa / des ni mdo sde 'di la mos kyi 'gyur / gang zhig sems lab pang ni
167a4(1): pa byed 'gyur cing / 'dod pa'i yul gis gos pa myed 'gyur ci // 'dod yani yul gis gos pa myed pa dang / zas skom dag gis g.yos spu myi skyed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di kha mos par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes dgu rnams la 'di skad du// 'dod cha
167a5(1): gyod kyang nyes myed gang zer ba// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams la skur pa yin// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos myi 'gyur// gang zhig yid ches/ rtag tu rab brtan zhig / nan tan skyed nas chos rnams 'chol pa a/ skyo ba1
167a6(1): 'gyung ra gang zhag ri dang nags khrod rab gnas shing // shes rab bsgoms nas shin tu dag gyur dang // 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag la 'dod byed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang bzhig myig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'// rtag tu rmo
167a7(1): Sha byi rtogs gang yin pa// de ni ti brag bdud kyis bcing pas na// mdo sde 'di la mo sgo myi 'gyuraro// gang zhig myig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'// rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa myed gyur de pa// de ni bdud kyis gcings las grol bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la rmon
167a8(1): 'argyas gagang nis phyi gnas 'jig pa'i yan nyis na gtag tu 'o du ci no sa byed pa// deni ldan gyis bas sas thos bsam// zhes ni 'an lta sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// rna la yA dang sre lus 'di dag dang/ ga gzus snga dri rings bya / 
167a9(1): nam blas gas chu me byu ba nyid pa dang gdam pa sems cad thug pa zung po nga gakhams deng 'jig chen bye phying bded dang /  'dod chags 'i sdeng gti mug pa brgya phred/ ga 'chal brgyags skye na pa don nam rgyu du na
167b1(1): man/ gtsag/ gang nin gyi 'das pa ni da sa/ nag tu song shi yong tu kyi chung la/ de rgyam ma myod par srung ba na/ des ni mdo sde 'di thob kyi 'thu/ gang nis kyis pad ma 'di de da pa/ ta kyi
167b2(1): de yongs kyi nga /  de'i skye pyod / par ltung bab na/ de 'a so sde 'di la mosami 'gyur/ ga nin byin ni 'dzin pa de dgu la gartag tu mangs ni sa thong durjed pa bden skye rdo'i myod par srung bas na de/ des ni mdo sde 'di chos gyi

167b4(1): 'i pyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos myi 'gyur/ gang zhig dmyig gi rab dben la/ rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs myed pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// de la ni mdo sde 'di la mos par

167b8(1): 'aM gnas ni rtag tu rtogs gyurd pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig/ myig zad do so/ ma rtogs pa// de ni myig nas tshul khrims bsgrub myi nus// myi gnas tshul khrims

168a7(1): 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur// gang zhig kyi mad do po rab rtogs pa / des ni kun 'dzind ye shes bsgrub pa nas// pra myed ma tshug su/ ye shes bsgrub nas// blo myed ma tshogs ye shes rab bsgrubs pas// mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur dul/

168a10(1): di ches nye cos byed pa 'thob / gang zhig phyig zad do bo nyid sems shing nyin mtshan rab brtson le lo skyed par ni 'a// des ni kun 'dzin spobs pa mngon pa sbubs zhes// / mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu bstond par 'gyur da/ 
168b1(1): gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed pa// 'od zer 'byind pa'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab bstond cing / myig stong nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ gang gyis mchod rten brgya stong dpa byas shing / 
168b2(1): mdo sde 'di ni thos 'byung na// 'di'i yon tan de pas khyad don 'phags na / sangs rgyas spyan gis gzigs pa'i sems can rnams// bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad byed par// de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par mchod pa pas/

168b4(1): bya/ nga ni 'das pa'i skal pa brgya stong du// srid pa sudu 'khor gyur pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas dag ni tshad myed pa rnams la/ mdo sde 'di'i phyir ni rim 'gro byas// res 'ga' mar mye tshud byed pa
168b5(1): snying po re re'i tshad kyang dpam tshad nam// sAng nas mdo rje'adi la rab dang dag/ 'thob par bya phyir 'drend pa rnams la ma R+ha ste res ka' bye ton tsam pa ka dang ni/ su ma na dang mya ngan byed pa'i
168b6(1): 'bre pa brgya mtshan gdugs ni sna 'tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas// nga sngon 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe// / slong du 'os pa dag la sbyin btang saste// res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag
168b7(1): kyang btang / res 'ga' zag pa khron 'chu myig be ta gdes 'ga' glang po che dang bzhon pa dang // res 'ga' rin cen rta rang chung ma btat+te/  redas 'ga' na ser gi khri dang rin cen gur// res 'ga' sen mo do dang 'phreng ba btam

169a4(1): 'arnams ga yongs su mus gang sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// ring ben rnam pa lnga 'grogs dag yi bzhini nong bu rin po rje / sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ 'drin yod rnams ni rtag dre pas

169a6(1): phyir/ 'khor ba dag la 'khod pa'i tshe// drin ni bcung zad yod la yang // de la/ de la rtag tu 'drin du gzos// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// rnyed pa/ ma btsal chos ma bskur// nyen shes sems can rnams kha ni// 
169a7(1): stong pazed ga ni rang du byed dag rjod ma rje 'di'i myo// ma thos legs pan du ldan pas na// chog la 'dod par med byed cing // bshes pa'i gyi na byed/  rjon ma rdo 'di'i phyid// phyi dgen sam
169a8(1): skyesas 'gyur na// myur pa nyid du rab bshags pas// 'phel yang yang ni yongs ma byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// rgyal po'i bum ni gyur da lan// rin po rmi dang byug smos dang // spos kyi phye ma ji snyed pa// dngu pa'i sems
169a9(1): nades skyed nas/ sangs rgyas rnams la sngos shing phul// pa sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// khri mon brtson la snying me as// / sdug bsngal lnga 'tshogs gang myong ba ni/ yul kyi sbyin par dang mu blangs/ ba rjod ma sngo 'd-i
169a10(1): 'i phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs nas// rtag tu dus drug gi che// sdom pa dag ni rab tu blangs/ ra sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// rtag u bzod pa rab bsgoms pas da/ tha ni chung ma dag la yang / 'dod pa'i shu se ma sA yod ma/ 
169a11(1): byed// kang sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ dbul longs dag ni thams cad kun// bdel bu dag ni thog bya'i phyir de/ nod dag gis phyag pos byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'dir phyi / dges slong dang ni bram ze dang // skyes dpa
169b1(1): tra la ba sna 'tshogs kun / thams cad dag ni rab tu bsdus tan sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ thams cad kun la phan btags phyir// rtag tu sbyin bdag cher byas nas// slong ba dag ga yongs su btang / res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag
169b2(1): sems cad napa' ya mdas pata ning // yid bzhin du ni mchis par byas dang sngon sbyin pa btang ba'i che na sems ni rtag tu snyoms pas na / rdzal khrims yon tan ldan pa dang / sul khrims 'thob dang rje
169b3(1): bye na gan sa dgas pa dra da ma man gyu dag dag sa do 'ams can segs sred dal/ 'azus pa sun la sbyin pa gras da byed pa gad / gi sems lasacan dpar byed pa'is sa
169b4(1): gyi 'chol zhing khang / 'do sde 'di la rtse gcin tha chu res zhag la yul khams dag tu ni// phyir rgol thams cad myed byas shing // klu rnams kun ni rab btul gnas/ hU~M/ dus bzhin char ni rab tu bab/ zla 'od khyod kyis shes gad kyi
169b5(1): pa'i ni rabs dpag byed nas mdo sde 'di ni mnyed pa'i phyir/ zhan dka' ba rnamasas ni rab thu spya rkyen bskal pa brgya stod snyed du ni// brjod kyang maH/ ra mthug myi 'gyur ro// yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas/ ma 'ong
169b6(1): mdzus kyi ga yang dag 'drad pa'i senas byed la/  mdo sde 'di ni na nga gyi / pa ni sangs rgyas/ spyad dag gis/ gsong sacus ni shes sa la gzigs pasan na spyod la sna tshogs mi la// thams / 
169b7(1): rab kyu ma khyed pa yin na dge slong dag ni gang zhig gis// bla byed ye shes bcal ba'i phyir ni kau shi nang tu dang pa'i sems kyis ni// mdo sde 'di ni gang ba stond pan nga/ keng zag de dang phyogs rnams dang // sems can ma lus thugs su zud
169b8(1): ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe mdo 'di thos nas gad mos pa bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang // thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis// mdo sde 'di la ma thos pas// chos bstand pa wa sku rad 'de bA sa
169b9(1): thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang // dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis// mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas gshin tu gtung pas du byed pas// de kun ngas ni lung bstan de nas/ brgyal po gtso bo thod zer
170a1(1): 'thang ga zla kyad tshus zhes pa kyis mams rgya na 'phrul pa thobs kyis ni ga gang dag yidin tan pa dang gang dag sani sa ga dang // phan mos pa gang yin na// mams cad sa zus pa bdu // sems pan das nams
170a2(1): rang bzhid la rtag pas gis gting 'dzin rnams la rab gnas nas// 'khor ba dag la ma chags pas// ban pag chags rnams kyang ni// gtan nas rab tu gang spangs pa// de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams// thams
170a3(1): nad la lus thugs su chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// myi bden chos la zhend pa dang // sems can bdag ni gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas la ni rab mos pa// ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu// thams cad ma 'jug
170a4(1): thugs su chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// 'jig rten bde la rab chags pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag// legasang pa nyid du myi sbed pa// rgyu dang rkyen ni de'i phyir// spyod pa rnams ni nyam sa
170a5(1): Shang 'a ThA ga su yang rung ba gang zhig gis/ byang du de ba ma bon togs gyu ra na/ gang zag de yis nges/ par ni/ rnam dag 'od ka zer dpag myed po pa// kha 'od khyor
170a6(1): kyi sa 'di lta bur/ 'od gzer dri la sogs pa'i/ rgyu dang rkye dang ni re re kun/ so so tha dad nyid ltos/ khyod kyis shes rab stobs kyis ni// thams cad de ltar rig pa
170a7(1): khyis/ gang zhig kyi dge grogs spangs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten nas nas tshul khrims rnam dag gang bsrung ba// sangs rgyas 'od gzer bsgrub par gyur// khyod kyi
170a8(1): dbang po rab bsrungs la/ ngo ma khrel byed rab tu spog// dge ba'i chos ni rab pasgoms la// sems can rnams ni bsrung bar gyis// khyod kyis mod la rab spongs so// song nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis// rnyed
170a9(1): ba dag la sa gdu bar// mang po sa yigal bgadu ldan par gyis/ khyod kyis rnyed par lka ni/ myi gtsang lta bur lta bar gyis// rnyed pa'i tri ma dag gis ni/ nam dag sems ni sngags
170a10(1): byed rnam par grol ba bsal par byas/ tha myed skyed gar thos par 'gyur// khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la/ sa ngas rgyas chom nyid 'dra bar sdos/ chos kyi smon
170b1(1): chen rtag la la// 'jig rten kun ni snang bar gyis// khyod kyi sems ni'i rgyal snar // myi yod nyid du rab su byos/ khyu ngan dang ni 'deg sa pa dang / thams ca cad bzod pa dang du long / khyod ni sems/ 
170b2(1): can nas kyi phyir/ dge bshes yang dag rab tu byos/ dman sems ni yongs yongs la/ rnam dag las ni rtag tu bsgrubs// khyod kyi sems ni brtan byos la/ 2/ pra myed chos ni rab du ston/ 
170b3(1): mdog sde dam pa 'di lta bu/ brtse ba can la sbyin par gyis/ bla myed ye shes gang tshol ba// 'khor ba dag la 'jigs pa byed// des nas sdig pa rnams snga nas// phan yon/ 
170b4(1): mchog nI thob par 'gyur/ dper sh+lo dang ldan pa da/ mye la pyod par mkhas pa gang // mo rnam la tsho ga pa sbyin byed kyang / myo zhe ni sreg par yor myi 'gyur// gang zhig
170b5(1): blo dang myi ldan pa// thabs dag la ni myi mkhas pa// mye khyer lag mthil gang banag pa// myes ni ral dud/ bsgeg par 'gyur// ji lta ma zhig drag dag gi// bes ni 'jug
170b6(1): la te shes zhes bsgrub lam gyur// yang das 'on med rgyang rgya gyur/  smyig pa/ 
170b7(1): gnagazhan sa sos ga 'an pa dag ni byed par sbeng/ 'o me dag ni byu pa byung // de ban ga zug dang // sa nanas pa mtho da/ ze ldan don
171a1(1): myi zod sems ni mtho ba dang / rgyagapa dang yongs pa'ing rgyal dang / g.yo sgyu dang ni lag myed dang // gya rgya la sogs rab tu yang // thams cad 'dod chags bzhin tu bshad
171a2(1): dra dag ye shes thob gyu rad na/ myi gzhi zhi ba nyid du rtogs/ rin pa nyid rtogs pa'i phyir/ 'od gzer dag ni 'byung par 'byung // yang dag ye shes ba 'gyur na// / sangs rgyas
171a3(1): tshul la rab tu nas// tshul pa rab tu nas pa'i phyir// 'od gzer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// / yang dag ye shes thob par 'gyur ni// sangs rgyas thab la gnas par 'gyung // thabs la rab tu
171a4(1): gan la pa'i phyir// 'od gzer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par// sgrib pa dag ni gtan spongs zhing / 'od gzer 'byung ba bsgrub par ni// ngas sngon pa thos mthong
171a5(1): ngo yang dag ye shes ral 'asgrub sa nas/ bsgril ba'i gcom pa kutan song shingapyod pas rjes ga 'thang la/ 'od gzeng ba bye dpa po zabs gyur/ rgyal ba'i spyod pa yong ma chos zhing /

171a7(1): thob kyi gyur/ myig la bdag myed gang rtogs pa// dbye sbyong chos ni bsgrubs par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od gzer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// myig ni mab zad gang rtogs pa// na pa skye ba'i mapa yang
171a8(1): gal/ gan pa skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pa// dge sbyong chen po'i chos zhes phyi/  gags de sgron gi ngo bo nyid// mapa 'ani yongs bral gas na/ hU~M/ cig ni skye ba'i mthal das kyang / yongs su shes par gyi 'gyur ba/ gang pas
171a9(1): de'i sade lta bu'i// 'od khyer 'byed pa thob myi 'gyur// gas+t+ra myig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni yongs su shes nu ma na/ myig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / yongs su shes pa nyid mu 'gyur te// gang zag de yis lta bu'i
171b1(1): 'a sa pa byed pa po byung/ te sbyin par byed// ma di migs ma ba shes sa / byig ni skye ba'i babs khyab/ senas pa nyid kyi sa/ dag se na se 'o// dag ces

171b6(1): nga pa nas // con ga se bskyed pa 'ogasas gyur/ rkyen mab nyid// nas dag sems lapas shes na// na bzhin dag / legs pa ni sa pa shes mas/ nga/ gang brgan / 
171b7(1): dwe \u0f7f sa // 'on ga zer khyed ma los phyi gyur// gal te myig g.yo po nyid// rnam dag legs par shes 'gyur na// rnabal ro ba 'am dag pa// legs pa nyid du rtogs 'byung bas// gang zan de mi
171b8(1): de lta bu'i/ 'on gzer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// de bzhin sna dang lde dang lus/ yid dang gzugs sgra ni ro dang // reg bya chos dang / sa mu dang / bye rlu dag gi garos po// dang // 'jig rten sdug la lnga li rlung
172a1(1): dang / mam dang 'jig rten skye ba dang / sgra dang phying las sogs pa sngag gamams pan de bzhin ni ga lar gyis/ de na ma bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ma 'o gso dung gyur na pa zhi gang
172a2(1): ma pa nas maman to//  rig sa bu sems can theg pa rten po nga drug par gnol zhing / yod gce khyen pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dod pa dos// dashes pa'i rtsa pa'i tshigs parnam pa brgyan cu tho ni dag mngon pacwan/ 
172a3(1): kha bya'o// gnam pa brgyad bcu ga bzhe na// 'di lha ste sems can yongs su srung zhi rjes su dran da // gnod sems sbyin pa dang // tshul khrims yongs su dag pa srung zhing nyams par myi byed pa dang // sems shin du tu mnyam pa dang / 
172a4(1): g.yo rgyu myed pa dang // ser sna myed dang / phrag dog myed pa dang / 'dod chags sems pa myed pa dang // sru ba'i bsams pa myed pa dang / theg pa chen mo'i mdo sdenas pa dag la mngon lam yid ches pa dang
172a5(1): dbang phyug dang / rgyags bzhend cing srid pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ka/ sngon la byams phyir myi/ ldog pa dang / bsams la shin du rnam par dag pam 'gyur par dang / 
172a6(1): dkon pa na gnas pa dang / 'khor nam la myi rtond pa dang // rnyed pa la rmyi rtend pa dang / grags pa la myi rtend pa dang / bsams gtan rab la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzind rab tu ston pa dang / 
172a7(1): tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la sgyu myed par rim lasgo byed pa dang / chungs po mtshungs par spyod pa dag la mchog gi bsams pa skyed pa dang / chosA la gus pa'i phyir/ mkhan po slar pa slob 'apon la gind tu bkur ba dang / mdo'i sde'i
172a8(1): den rab tu rtogapa pa dang / yang dag par snyand pa la mkhas pa dang / tshig smras pa 'i rnams la myi bden pa myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsams la la gnas pa dang / dges pa'i rta pa bskyed pa sa ba rtson pa dang / rtag tu smin 'i
172a9(1): nyid 'du rte gas pa dang / gzugs la myi shes pa yongs su tshol pa dang / lus dang srog la pangs pa myed pa dang // 'khor na po// das su rjes su ston mar byeg pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsams pa yongs su
172b1(1): bcud pa dang / 'jig rten daphyi'i chos myed do zhes zen pa'i log par lta ba'i rnam pa sangs pa dang / dang dung po bslabs pa dag la bya mu'i mtshan ma myi ston pa dang / gang bslabs par 'gyu red pa dag la ci nus kyis
172b2(1): bar bye nas rab tu stond pa dang / glu dang ros mo i dag sgra dag gi bsngags pa myi brjod pa dang rgyand dang yo byad kyi bsngags pa myi brjod pa dang / bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhu shes pa dang / mang du thob pa phum su ma
172b3(1): tshogs pa dang / gnyid rab tu sangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas la lus pa dang / byang chub tu sems skyed me dang / 'jig rten de pa'i las yongs su sa ngas/ 
172b4(1): ba dang / bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dgra pas brtson pa dang / chos la sred pa'i phyim grogs khyad par can la rten dpar byed pa dang / dgel ba'i rtsa pa rnams yongs su tshol ba la skyo myed pa dang / rab tu 'gyub
172b5(1): pa la zhinab tu mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi srung zhing yongs su'adzin dpar byed pa dang / sdig pa las myi spyong pa dang /  'gyu da pa rnams kha the cob myed pa dang / dpes stond pa la rab tu bag
172b6(1): da gi bslab pa spong ba dang / pha rol kyi smra ba rnams nadad gcod pa dang / nges par 'gyur pa'i la pa yongs su tshol la dang / spyod pa tshad myed pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos kyi ye shes dag la sems
172b7(1): nges par 'gyur da pa dang / rtswa dang 'bral bu gas la snathong zhing / 'khor ba rgyun myi gcod pa dang / srid pa gsum po dag la chags pa yod pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal sangs pa dang / mngon pa ma yin/ 
172b8(1): che pa dag la gnyen po rnams par gzhag nas ston par byed pa da // ma 'ongs pa'i 'brab bu rnam pa yor sbyin pa'i byed brag rtogs par khong du chud pa/ dang / sngon gyi mtha' yongs su shes pa dang / gzhan gyi dring
172b9(1): ya myi ltos pa dang / yongs su spong sa'i spyod pa dag le rtson 'grus kyis grub par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dzin dang / dpel byed 'gyod pa phrin gsum tshogasu par byed pa gang yin 'di ni rnam pa rgya
173a1(1): bcu zhes bya'o// gzhan yang zhun 'od gzhon bu chos brgyad bskupo 'di dag ni/ chos lnga'i nang du 'jig pa de 'gyur ro// chos lnga gang zhe na gas lha di lta ste rlos pashes pa dang / mya ran sde 'das / 
173a2(1): shes pa dang / nyon mongs bzad pa shes pa dang/  mchog tu 'gyur ba pa shes pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes ga yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla kod gzho nu chos lnga po de dag ni chos gnyis kyi nang
173a3(1): su 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyand pa dang / gzugs yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa pa gang yin pa'o/ gzhan dbab ma 'od gzhan
173a4(1): chos gnyeb po de dag ni 'chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ gcig gang zhe Shan/ 'di lta ste/ de gzhan gshegs pa da nams kyi thogs pa myi ma pad+ma rnam par krol ba mngon par sgrub pa

173a6(1): par byed do// nam brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i tshig tshogs dang / shes rab rgya chen pom gyuras pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su grub pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba nang bral
173a7(1): pa dang nga rgyal rab tu bcom pa dang / tshig mnyen pa dang / dngos po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang / dgebI ge gso so yongs su shes pa dang / the kra mA chen byo yang dag par gzhol ba dang / brtson 'grus
173a8(1): kyi go cha gos pa dang / spyod lam gis yems can 'dul ba dang / nyon 'apong sa par lhung ba rnams kyi the tsom rab tu karjod pa dang / kyi dgal ba rnams la smod cing chos dkar po rnams mngon par 'grub pa dang / 
173b1(1): bya chu sa rubya ba bya sa bya sa bya sa rgya bya ba

173b5(1): sa gnas pa dag lapa rtend cing rim 'gro byed pa dang / theg dman pa dag Ta ki mam ma sngags pa myi brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi reg pa dag lag ring du song ba dang // phyir rgol bla rnams che nga gcod pa dang / sangs rgyas
173b6(1): ldan 'das dbyams mchod pa rgya chen po lagam sa nas kyan mangs // lags pa'i sems kyis dbul par byed pa dang / thogs pa/ chen byed phyi'i le ge sathob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum chog pa ra

173b9(1): rdzogs pa dang /  ga mi byin chen po das ldan pa dang kauspobs la 'og pa ba byed pa dag/ mang du zhal ma phun sum chog sa dang / myi dges pa rnams kyi bsngagasal gyi brjod pa dang / dashes pa'i las yang dag pam me

174a1(1): 'khor ba la yongs su skyob myed pa dang // mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su tshol pa la mos pa dang / 'anod pa chung phyir dgond pa na gnas pa dang / rtags tu bsod/ snyoms slong zhing le lo myed par gyur pa/ pa dang tre ci tsam/

174a7(1): nan 'das kyi spyan rdza gas su bcad me mangs pas sapyod pa// de bzhi gshenas pa smin pad ma su ma na papa/ de ldan nas nag le gre ston kyangan yin yeshe napa dege bzhi ston

174b1(1): tshangs dbyangasaka mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs la lags/ bcom ldan 'ad sngon ni/ sems can pan btags pas/ de slad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags/ rnam dag gsus ni yongs su rdzogs na ke/ 'jig
174b2(1): rten da tshad byed rnams ga khan 'dogs mdzad// de bzhin gshegs khas byig nyid stong mkhyen pas/ de skad kun ma 'dzin mkhyen la rdzogs pa lags/ kun 'dzind mkhyen da yongs su rdzog sa bas na
174b3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gapes bdag pyid ston nga/ de bzhin gshegs pas byig gi khyad pa 'amakhyen pa/ myig gi khyad par dag kyang mthas mchis/ mkhyen da pa'i phyir ni dpag tu ma mchis pas/ de bzhin gshegs 'od ga

174b5(1): gang nig kyig sa dpag byed papa sems dpas sa ma/ gsung ni bden pa nyid du sa/ sa sa rgyam gsung na bag / gas pas na/ de bzhin gshenas can po gzer des bkod / 
174b6(1): rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongs rdzogs pas/ myig gi 'jigs pa dpag myed thugs su rud / byig gi 'jigasus rab tu mkhyen pa ra phyi na// 'jig rten thams cad ni phan 'dog sa gadzad/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
174b7(1): mchog 'ang gyur dwa pa/ myig gi ra skye ba dpag myed rab tu mkhyend/ ji ltar bcom ldan myig gi skye ba mkhyen pa/ dpag kyang ring por myi thogs de bzhin shog/ de bzhin na ba sA dang / lce lus yid/ gzugs skra bri ba re bya dag dang
174b8(1): chos/ 'jig rtend skye dang thA dang myig la sogs/ thams cad la yang de bzhig rab tu mkhyen de// thugs rje chen po rkangapa gnyis mchog gyur da ya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum chog/ 'ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin
174b9(1): ba'i pha ro la da byon da// bdag kyang ring por gyi thog pa de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po/ rkang gnyid mchog gyu rad pa/ tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol khyon dang / ldan/ ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims la rol da byon
176a1(1): bdag kyang rib por myi thogs de bzhin shog/ thuska rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur da/ pa/  bzod pa'i pha rolan byon po phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan bzon pa'i pha rol byon do/ bdag kyang
176a2(1): ring por myi thog pa de bzhin shog ga zugs rje chen po rkang nyis mchog chu dang pa/ brtson bgrus/ pha rol dbyon phun gsum ma tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol dbyon da/ bdag kyang ring por
176a3(1): ngogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang nyis mchog gyu rad pa/ bamam tan pha rol dbyond pa phun sum/ mtshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan bsam tan pha rol dbyond/ bdag kyang ring por myi thogs de bzhin shog
176a4(1): tsathug sa rje chen po rka panyis mchog gyur da pa/ shes rab pha rolarang du byon pa phun yum mtshogs/ da ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab nga pha rol dbyon da / bdag kyang ring por myi logs de bzhin shog/ 
176a5(1): zug pa rje chen po rkang nyis mchog gyur da pa/ chos sku li pa rol dbyon bdun gyi ma mchogs/ ji lta bcom ldan chos sku'i pha rol dpyond/ bdag kyang ring por gyi thogs de bzhin shog
176a6(1): thugs rje ran po rkang nyis mchog gyur da pa/ rnam dag gzug ni bdag myed phun rnaM sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan pa/ bdag kyang ring por gyi thogs de bzhin shog/ 
176a7(1): thugs rje chen po rke nyis mcho bya gyu rad pa/ rnam dag yid ni bdag myed phun su so tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan yid ni yid ldan pa bdag kyang ring por thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang nyis 'chod gyur / 
176a8(1): yon tan chog ni bdan byed phun mupa tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog ldan \u0f7f/ bdag kyang ring por myi logs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang nyis mchog gyur na/ gzugs kyi mtshan ni

176b3(1): myi thog sa de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur dra ba/ zhesdang spyod pa dpag myed dag las 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdangapa skyod 'das pa/ bdag kyang ring bor mi thogs de bzhi

177a2(1): dren da pa zhe sdang dgasal ma yong sa 'das pas/ 'jig rten dkun la shin dbu phan 'dogs marba da/ rdzi skar bcom ldan 'jig rten na man 'dogs ts+tsha/ 'dag kyi bde 'dral ye shes grus pa shog/ badren da pa gte gsug

192b1(1): nyams pa dag ga spyo gzug par bzhi phan tshun gtam stan brjod// bud byed gang sum mya ngan 'jigs gyur dpa// bod gzer byed dkyis bde ba stong bras chu ni/ skyes pa bud byen ro sa 'grel babam la// drimam
192b2(1): pa'i chos dag rab bgad pas// thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de// thugs mchog zhabs la 'phyi bdud phyag byas nas// kha cig bcom la b+hU myed lam rab tshol// bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu shegs pas na/ 
192b3(1): bcom ldan ka du lta zhing dang nyin dga'// bcom ldan mkhyen pas pa'i spyod rtogs pas// jig rten rjes thun phan pa rab tu mdzan// chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin/ rin chen mchog ni sem
192b4(1): narnamasas btang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs na pa'i tshe// mkhas las ni ni skad rung // gang deg byig pa das kyi med / sangs rgyas sa ni gum pa med/ co
192b5(1): grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung gang zhig myig skye mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// gang zhig myig zad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas yid ches myi 'jigs thob// myig
192b6(1): zad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang brgyan myi 'chad// gang zhig phyig zad mtha' sred pa// chos la yin ches mi 'dzi grom 'thob// myig zad mthar ni lha na bas na// shin tu dang brgyan gyi batshad// gang zhig
192b7(1): phyig zad mtha' sred pa// dge 'dun yidan ches te jigs 'phob// myig zad mdzar ni ltabs na// gidan du dang pi rgyun myi 'chad// gang zhig myig zad mtha' sred pa// tshul khrims 'dzin myed 'thob par gyur// myig zang
192b8(1): mdzang ni lta bas ni// shind tu dang pa rgyun dmyi 'chad// gang zhig myi gzad mtha' sred/ 5/ ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong par gyur/ myig zad mthar ni lta bas na// 'dod chags rgyun ni sporang bar byed// gang zhig myi gzang
192b9(1): mas bred pa// ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang mdor bar gyur/ byig zad mthar ni lta bas na// zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig myig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur// myig zad mthar ni lta
193a1(1): gang gig kyis nimin ga phrad pa/ de nyin du cos byed// de gang sa com byed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyab cu 'phrul bathob par 'gyur// gang zhig byin gyi sbyin pa ga// de ni nyag tsu na gyis byed/ de gar renom byed pa'i byeg gsadas byas gyu
193a2(1): phrub tho za bar grus dag gig kyig byed pa med pa/ de ni rtag tu ba ros byed// de ltas de com pa'i phyir// sangs rgya dru saphrul thob par 'thung // gang zhig rtsig zhi 'a sred pa gde ni rtag du the com byed/ de ljang po la thaM bya
193a3(1): ba'i phyir// pangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bathob par 'gyur// na pa sna lde sus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang myig gi par du yang / thams cad de bzhin spyad par bya// myig skyed dpag myed kar skyed pa// ye shes dpas
193a4(1): myed skyed par byed// ye shes dpag myed pa'i phyir// chos 'di bstan pa yang de bzhin no// myig zad dpag myed gang shes pa// myig la sgrib pa myed par 'gyur// de ltar sgrib pa myed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mkhyend pa phog pa myed job// na ba snga khri lus
193a5(1): sum ra rin byinas// zla tung gi sa mar/ ma ma rgan cin gyud bar bya// ma pa rdzing nyes shegs pa'i tshe// sems pad dgani brgyago snyed/ sacom pashed tha 'ol pas// 
193a6(1): pad na samo byed/ cag 'do tug pa sems bya // sa ma rgyab mes dis kyi byed/ gang zhig 'dod gas mem mgyu dal/ yang byang 'o te stong sa gyud/ cig lags de sa gra / ma byed pashes mo phre rdzong// 
193a7(1): d+hes chos ni sgrub pa dang / na pos reg pa ma sa kyi byed// byis pa bamam gtan gom byed kyang // bsam tan 'brel mos baman// mngon pa'i rgyal rab byed nas// dge sbyong bras bu 'ob su sems// byas pa pas pagarten no kyi
193b1(1): sa she kyi zugan/ ga rgya gang nod kyag//  na yos kyi blag gang gi gapa pa'i sdug cang // da pa shes yo kyi gyur//  pa byed// ga so na na
193b2(1): gang zhig 'du shes zhend byed pa// 'du shes zed mtha' shes pa myed// 'dus shes zad pa ma shes phyir// rtag tu 'du shes zag le spyod// gang zhig 'jig rten da zhend chags pa// 'jig rten de mtha' shes pa myed// 'jig rten zad mtha' mazhes phyir// rtag tu 'jig rtend/ 
193b3(1): spyod// gang bzhig zag cas sems la gnas// sems zad mtha'i shes pa myed// sems zad pa ni nam shes phyir// rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod// gang zhig zag bcas ros la gnas// dachos zad mtha'i shes pa byed// chos med pa ni ma shes phyir
193b4(1): rtag tu bag panam chos la spyod// sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas 'gyur da kyang /  da/ myig man ma pa'i shes byed na// myig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// yang dag 9 sbyangs la gnas pa byin/ 'dog bskur ba'i gos bgos kyang // myig pad ma 'i'i shes Ta Tha
193b5(1): byedad/ byig bdam ni cishes phyir// dan ma can pa ga sa/ b.rab pa rigs su skyes rgyag kyang // byig ngan ma 'i shes byed na/  byig ba pani sa shes phyir// doni dag pa 'i gas yin// ma ma da na
193b6(1): thung kyang // byig pad mnga'i zhes byed // srung tu da 'gror srung gyu te/ 2/ khor ba dang ni skyob kyi nus// ng+ge'i rig pa ma sa gyur da kyang // byig bdam 'i gas byed na// byig pad pa ni la shes byeng // sgra'i rig partogs pa yin/ bzo namam 'di mthab zud ba
193b7(1): kyang // myig pa bad pa dza'i shes byed na// 9/ myig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// de ni 'a'o la gakhas pa myid// 'dri ba yang la mkhas gyurd cing // yi ge gcig gis rnams byed kyang // byig zad ma pa'i ges byed na// de ni don 'thun bshad ma yin// mkham pa'i
193b8(1): rjes su bro ba byed kyang // gapags pa dang gsang byin// / myi shes shing // gamyig bdam pa'i shes myed na// cos ni rtogs par myi 'gyur ro// rjod pa rnyog brgyad phan dang // chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang // phyig pad ma pa'i she ba myed na// 'khri shingadu
193b9(1): thor lhung ba kadz+ra// sgra'i rig pa mkhas ga gyuran cing // dge dang phyi rke rtags ston dang // tshig 'bru'i yi ge'i sgra sman dang // klog dang 'don pa'i mtha gyur dkyang // myig pad mtha' ni ma shes na/ de dag nams ni shes byed yid/ bud byed

194a8(1): rnam pa dag byig po ba gyur da// na ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs kra dri ro reg bya nas// shasma dang mying gyi bar du yang // sems cad de bzhin sbyar par bya// 'dod pang gti mug khong khro dang // nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas/

194a10(1): / dpes byed pa'i mying yang thos/ ma cig zhe sa 'jig byed bcing // 'jig rten pan 'anogs mying dag dzis/ 'aci ga gti mug rab rtogs shing / brgyal 'dul ba'i phyi yang ros// khwa cig 'jig rten dag la ni

194b3(1): gtso bo yis// 'jig rten sgrol ba'i mying dag thos// mying ni de dag thos gyur da nas// thams cad nam dag myig zo ba gyur de// nam mkha' dag ni rgya mtsho chu// ri rab lhun po bar du yang thams cad gzhol du rung srid kyi/

194b10(1): tam ni 'di skad smras// 'dren pa der ni 'jig rten dbyung bas na// lA myi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad// sa p+pa'i lha 'khor gzhal myed lang gnas nas// dang shrI sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du badrenan pa

198a5(1): bsdu ba'i spyod bzhi 'phel bar mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen na yis// klu rnams kyis ni yod pa bskor na nas// zhe sdang rtedamyigs bshad pa gnan pas// zhe sdang sems ni spangs par gyur na/ 
198a6(1): kazhi le lugs rje chen po las// kaganod sbyin na rnams kyis yongs bskon ga nas// nam 'che nyem dbyigs bshad pargyan pas// rnams pa che sems ni spangs par gyur// de me thugs rje chen po yos// lha ma yin gyib song sa
198a7(1): bgan dar/ bas pa'i nye ba byin sa bshad pa stan te/  pa ma gams pa'i bsngags pa mngon/  rugs de chen thams// nam sal ni gis yongs pastod nas// gal gnyis dbyig sa bshad pa na te/ 
198a8(1): sa pa'i sems kyi bsngags pa 'du/  na ji sa mad bya mangs 'gon nas/ sa tshas cig nin pag byed kyis// de bzhini gshegs pa'i 'amags brjod bstanan//  sa
198b1(1): na pa ni blo byed/ na man / na byin na gas gyun// sapa na po gyur stan da pas// sems cad dan pa tu gang med/ khyi jug pamanan pa brgyan
198b2(1): dang/  na byinan don no rton sa par chu na// rdugs rje chen po u na bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya snyen// byin dben bstan na pa thos pas na// mtha byin don na rtogs par gyur/ 
198b3(1): drug pa rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/ byig la skye byed bstan na po'aphra bas/ mtha byinan non na rtogs par gyur // zugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstanan pas/ 
198b4(1): sems can dag ni brgya stong sbed/ gagabyig byed paston pa thob pa na// ma pa nga byin don ni rtogs par gyur// rugs rje chen pos 'brel bstan pas/ khrag sems can dag ni yang brgya stong sten// myig ni nye 'i
198b5(1): pa tan zos pas// mthar da phyi nad don ni rtogs par gyur // thugs rje chen pos 'phrul pas nad pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// myig la dpag myed bstanan thos pas// mtha da phyind don ni rtogs par gyur da// 
198b6(1): sems can byen thos sam// ma na byin donan rtog sa par gyur// thugs che chen pos baphrul brtan na las// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// byig sa thog byed thos pas na// sa byin nan rtogs par rgyag/ 
198b7(1): drug sa rje chen pos la phrul mtshan na mas// sems can nadag ni brgya stopa snyed// myig la ga mos pa byen thos byas// ma ba dren gyin don ni rtogs par gyur na// zugs rje chen pos 'phrul ldan pas// sems can nams sa
199a1(1): na rten shes parab san de/ shen sa rtsig rkyed nyid du mad/ gzugs rte rten thos 'phrul btan pas// sems can rnams la rgya me ni// 'di rten rnye parabam/ ke/ 'du pa rgyas kyis
199a2(1): jugapa na pa rdzu na tho yus bstan pas// sem pa darnams pa rgya na// shan ma shes pa rab ma de/ ga byed shes ba rdzags sa// zu dzin par 'phrul gan das/ 
199a3(1): bems can 'arnam pa la rgya cher ni/ 'jig rtenan pas mnyan rab skrad de// 'jig rtend pa'i ting 'dzinan bsngags// thugs che chen pos rdzun na pas// sems can rnam sa la rgya chen ni// bag bcu ma tshul zhim sa rab ldan te// 
199a4(1): zag byed pa pA ba gnas bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// sems rgya chu ru'i skyon brjod de// sems rgya che ba'i yon tan pa sngags// / thug pa rje chen

199a7(1): thig garanga'i mtshan nyin pastan du la che / nas lus da na/ gzugs slang dag byanas// slan byung gi bar la pa// khams bzhi sbyar par bya// gzugs kyichen pos yul bldan nag/ 
199a8(1): nas kyi ni gnas pa pa rjong 'o/ sgyu sa kyigs pa rje yon pan bstan/ thugs grus bstan nas// sems can rnams sa bye na/ ga pa da ni 'drem pa sa// nye gyin
199b1(1): nyeb dbyigs dpag byed yod gyur da bstand// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// bud phyug myed gyur pa la// nyes dmyigs dpag myed yod par bstand// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul

199b4(1): rje chen pos 'phrul bstand nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshul khrims bsnyems par gyur da pa la// nyes dmyigs dpag myed yod par bstanan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstand nas// sems can rnams la rgya

199b6(1): chags de bzhin no// lugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig sems dang yin// dman par gyur da pa de dag la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstand// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstand nas

199b8(1): cho ga shes chos ni hond par mdzad// gzhan yang spos kyi dri gtsang khar// mye tog dag gi gzhal phyed khang// khang pa brtsegs ma mchog smra lad nas// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan da// gzhan yang lha'i bu mo

200a1(1): shrIM/  mye tog 'brer logs mchod byed 'a tand// gzhan yang lnga'i mu nam nag/ pad ma sngon po khang pa na// gnas pa lus byed bstan de nas// sangs rgyas yon gtan la sngags pa bstand// gzhan yang chang

202a1(1): 'i phyir// mtshan rnams ni mngon par bsgrub pa dang // myig gi mtha' ni shes pa'i phyir// dbang po dag ni nges 'gyur dang // myig ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir// dbang po rang dbang thob pa bgyur da pa// des ni re//

207b8(1): stong pa'i gzungs ni gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu gang rtogs pa// 'di nyid sangs rgyas spyod yul la// rab tu gnas par byed pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas ro led pa yin// gnas la rab tu 'ganas
207b9(1): yin / 'di nyid sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul la// rab tu gnas par 'gyur pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas mkhyend pa la// rab tu gnas pa 'gyur da la yin// phyag ma zad mthas ni stobs dag la// de bzhin du ni
207b10(1): gnas pa dang // myig skye mtha'i bstobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang // myig gi mthe'i ni spobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa nas// nye bar zhi ba'i stobs kyi par// de la rab tu gnas pa dang/ 
208a1(1): rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang myir la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gzugs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
208a2(1): stobs// khyan 'phags la gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogs par byed ces zer// gzungs ni gang yin pani dag gis// gzil byin bzul stobs de lta bu// yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ni// de bzhin
208a3(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnas kun la ni 'jug pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// spyod yul kun gnas gyurd pas// / 'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun// lha ma yin gyi tshogs dgal/ 
208a4(1): brtand par 'dzind pa'i sems spangs nas// tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed/ gnod sbyin b+ha stong tshad myed dang // grul bum dag ni tshad myid rnams// de dag thams cad kund kyang ni// rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed
208a5(1): dr-i za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang // srin po'i 'khor ni gang yin pa/ datshad myed grags myed de dag kyang // ra 'du rdul ba dga' bar byed/ degal te tshangs pa'i 'khor na rnams kyis// sgra snyan dag ni dam
208a6(1): pa yis// tshig dang don ni brjod byed kyang // yang dag bstan par myi nus te// sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis// padag par bya ba ma yin dang // sems yas byung ba'i chos rnams kyis/ 
208a7(1): gzung bar bya ba byin zhes zer// gzugs ni gang yin 'di dag ni// myig gi dmyigs par bya ba myin// gzugs ni gang yin la 'di dag ni// lus kyi bar gyis dmyigs bya myin// gzugs ni ga pa yin 'di dag ni// myig gis
208a8(1): dbyigs par bya ba byin// myig gi spyod yul par gyis kyang // dmyigs par bya ba ma yin te// rna ba sna lce lus nis ni zla dang mying la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gzhan yang
208a9(1): kamyig gi zad mtha' dang // byig gi rnams kyi ni skye mtha' dang // myig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// nye bar zhi ba'i phyir dag la// bdag dang skyes bu myed pa dang // sems dang ni srog ni myed pa dang / de bzhin gang zag myed pa dang / 
208a10(1): mtshan ma byed cing byed myed dang // 'gro ba myed cing 'od myed dang // 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan// thams cad rtogs par/ 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan yang 'di skad chos nyid kyi// myig ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan yang
208b1(1): 'di skad chos rnams las// grub pa'i myig gi gang yin dang // ye shes myig dang shes rape myig/ tshangs pa'i phyag dar lha'i myig// tshangs par skyes nas tho bi myig dang / rdo d+he lha ni skyes nas tho ba myig dang // tshangs pa'i rnam smin pa/ 
208b2(1): myig nag dang // mar sa pa'i rgyu las skyes myig dang // lga'i rgyu las skyes byig dang // lha'i rdzu 'phrul myig dag dang // lha'i brtson 'grus dag gi myig/ dman par skyes pa'i myig dag dang // khyed 'phags skyes pa'i phyag dag der// gshin rjes
208b3(1): 'jig rten da gang yin pa// khongs su spangs pa'i phyig dag dang // klu dang gnod sbyin myig nag dang // rdul bus gyi ni myig dag dang // yongs sugazus bcas kyig dag nang// rnam par dag pa'i myig dag dang / rnam pa bdag byin gyig nag dang
208b4(1): bachu ring zhe chung myig dag dang / gnyan thos reg pa'i myig/ bsam tan pa'i myig dag dang // ting nge 'dzin kyi myig dag dang // spyod yul las byur myig dag dang // 'du sa shes las byung myig dag dang // 'dod chags las byur myig dag des
208b5(1): 'dod chags las bral ba myig dag dang // rgyu las byung ba'i myig dag dang rgyu las byung myin tAg dang // mtshungs par ldan pa'i myig dag nang / mtshungs par ldan byin myig dag dang / 8sgo brten da las byur myig dag dang // sgo las
208b6(1): byung sbyin rgyag dag dang // chu rkyen da pas byung byigatag dang / rtswa khas skyes myi ga dag dang / gagalas rgyung sbyin myig nag dang // ye shes rnamani yang dag myig nas dang / yod pa sbyin pa'i myig dag dang / dbyig6
208b7(1): byed byig ni gang yin pa// khams cad rtogs par byed ces zer/ na bska lce lus nas ni// sma dang mying la sosogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/ thams cad de bzhin spyad bya zhes zer/ 
208b8(1): de'i che na bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkhal par snang dag la ba ni gzhan yang dpag du myed pa'i// sgra snyan na rnam pa mchog byung nas// khyan par 'phags pa gzungs kyi chos// 'di skad du ni bka' 'chal na te// 'di yang de bzhin gag+nas
208b9(1): pa'i sa// rdzu 'phrul nag gis sprulan pa yin// 'di lta ste// / si le/ ma le/ ma le/ sid b+hi e ne/ si ne/ ku lu ni yu/ ku lu ni yu/ ku le/ ma le/ ku no te/ a la ge/ a si le/ si si~M le te/ mu si/ 
208b10(1): le si She/ si She/ khyi pi le/ a bi le/ su te tsa na/ d+hi ni ma ti/ ka ni ka lI te/ su ka le/ pra ya sha nar ni/ a nu lo si ke/ byi lo me/ su b+ha ne re g+he/ a shi re li/ sar ma par pun te/ ba ra biM he/ d+ha ni/ 
209a1(1): na shu tsa kA/ a d+h+we/ man/ sku pog ga/ nang kung ba no/ thA sa bA nang / pan ni/ rnams/ ni ma ri ka no ni/ mnang thA/ su mu tsata/ pa na Na / a b+hi la
209a2(1): pra ti thA sa/ rnar ni/ ma si ta ni li// gzungs rnams gang yin 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu skyes/ mthu chen nag ni phun sum mchogs// shes rab nag ni mad kyang byed/ 
209a3(1): 'dzind pa dag ni yongs su spong // dran pa dag ni dag par byed/ gzung ba myed 'gro dang 'ong ba myed// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams yod pa myin// mtshan ma myed cing brjod dang bral// spros pa dag las yang dag 'das// 
209a4(1): byang chub sems dpas sgrub byed na// mthar ni bsil ba 'jog par 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag/ brgya stor mar po dag gis ni// tshig cog tsam yang rab bstand kyang // mtha' ni dmyigs par
209a5(1): yod phyi nus// 'phags la mang po pa rab tu bsngags/ rnam pa/ dag cing zhend pa myed/ 'khor 'dus mang po thams cad kyis// shinan tu/ gus pa skyed par byed/ gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/ 
209a6(1): dgel ba'i chos kyi mthu' stobs kyis// nyon mongs rab bcomanyer zhi nas// khyad 'phags phan yon thob par byed// yon tanadang ni shes rab dag/ shi nan tu rgya che rgya cheb 'dra// bzod pa dang / 
209a7(1): ni 'grub par byed// sems ni rab bde g.yol myed 'gyur// byang chub sems nabs rtag tu bsgoms// mkhas pa dag gis rab du bsngags// rabul po res dag ni spor byed cing // nom dang rin cen thob
209a8(1): bar byed// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// yon tan rnams ni 'phel bar byed// rtag tu stong nyid la sogs pa'i// bden tshig dag gis rab tu brgyand// yi ge dag ni spangs pas na// stong pa'i ngo bo nyid
209a9(1): ces bya// sems dang rnam shes spangs pas ni// cho ste ngo bo nyid nas bya// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// dri bral rtag tu rnam dag byed// yang dag ye shes la gnas nas// phan pa sna tshogs stond par byed// 
209a10(1): bems can nag ni mang po rnams// dga' zhing dang bskyed par byed// gnod sbyind dag ni tshad myed dang // grul bum 'khor ni gang yin pa// 'di la sogs pa yi dgas rgyal// dga' ba chen po skyed ces zer// gzungs
209b1(1): bsngags gang yin 'di dag ni// rab tu zhi zhing spros pa myed// sems can dag la byams pas na// kun la bde ba sbyin par byed// bskald pa mang po brgya stong du// 'gro ba rnams su rtag gnas shing / phan pa ca/ 
209b2(1): skyed rab byed kyang // rnam par dag dring dgos pa byed// tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis// bdun rtsi'i chos ni rabya bas nad nas// sems can dag ni tshad myed nams// dga' ba chen po skyed par byed// sngon gyi sangs rgya/ 
209b3(1): cad byed rnams// kinang du na ma dag mos pa yis// gzungs 'di la ni bten nas su// rtag tu chos nyid rtogs par byed// tshangs dang brgya byind lha rnams dang // klu'i rgyal po lba ba yin// gsungs 'di 'os par gyur
209b4(1): nas kyang // sems kyis dga' ba skyed ces zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag rnams// gang du gnas pa'i yul der ni// rtag tu gnod dang 'khrug pa dang // nad dang sdug bsngal mya ngan byed// sems can dag ni
209b5(1): thams cad kun// pho bong dga' ba'i sems skyed nas// gzungs 'di rtag tu bdag cag ni// sems la nas par smon lam 'debs// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// lus dang sems dang dkan dag dang / 
209b6(1): kha mchu dag la gnas gyur na na// yon tan bdag byed skyed par/ byed// gal te rtag du 'dzind byed ni// yon tan tshad myen thob gyur na nas / sems can mang la phan 'dogs shing // thams cad dga' ba
209b7(1): rdzob ces zer// gzungs sngags gar yin 'di dag gis/ sdig pa rnams ni rab spongs zhing // dam pa'i dag ni ston byed pas thug pa myed pa'i spobs pa thob// sems can dag ni brgya stong
209b8(1): rnams// the dros dag ni rab pam khan nas// nga rgyal rnams ni rab com te// yon tan dpag myed 'job ces zer// ginang du zab ci gsu ba zhi chos/ gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// mkhas pas
209b9(1): rtag tu sems byed cing // nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par byed// shes rab go cha rab bgos nas// nyon mongs rab tu 'joms par byed// yon tan sems ni 'phel byed pas// rab tu mos shing skyo ba myed/ 
209b10(1): gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni// grags pa chen po phun tshogs pas// zad pa dang ni phyi zad dang // skye dang myi skye mtha' rab rtogs 'di dra'i shes rab sna tshogs kyis// bdag nyid rab tu brgyand pas na/ de bzhin / 
210a1(1): gshegs pa brgya stong rnams// shi nad tu gus shing mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i gzugs ni gang yin pa// rig pa dag gis rke nyis byed// ting 'dzind mchog la rab gnas nas// byang chub
210a2(1): kham la gzhol bar byed pas na// gzhi ga nas lhag mthong rjes 'brang zhing // zag myed/ shes rab rtogs par byed// rab dad dbang po stobs kyis ni// lag gnyis yongs su grub par byed// brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa yis
210a3(1): nu ma gnyis ni 'grug par byed// shes rab pha rol phyind pas na// sbyin gtsug mtshan nyid rab tu byed// mdo' sde dag gis skud byas nas// so sor zla'i 'phreng bar brgyus// sngon ni mngon par bklubs pa'i// yon
210a4(1): tan na ma hrI shes dang // dpe ni tshad myed ji snyed pa// thams can nab tu brgyand ces zer// gzungs sngags 'di dag ni// yon tan tshad myed phun tshogs pas// myig ni sngon dang phyin mtha' dang // zad dang myi zad mtha' dag
210a5(1): dang // skye ba dang ni myi skye dang // mtha' dang mtha byin gang yin dngadaben pa dang ni phyi dben dang // 'jug pa dang ni myi drug myin dang // ci yadamyed dang myi 'byung dang // nyer zhi dang ni bdag myed dang // gang zag
210a6(1): skyed dang srog byed dang // sems can myed pa'i lamadag dang // 'di la sogs pa'i tshad myed s+ho/ thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ na pa sA lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ 
210a7(1): 'jig rtend skye ba'i bying bar du/ thams cad de bzhin sbyar zer// gong du bsngags pa brjod pa'i/ gzungs mchog rnam pa gang yin pa// rab dben yon tan mchog ldan zhing // sangs rgyas spyod yul yin pas na/ 
210a8(1): gzungs don yang dag gang yin pa/ yi ges brjod bya ma yin yang // 'jig rtend pa'i brdzes su ni// btags pa'i mying gis brjod pa yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon
210a9(1): 'i khyim du byond pa dang / bdan bshams pa la bzhug so// de'i tshe zla 'od gzho nur gyur da pa// bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs par nig nas// bdag nyid mchod pa'i yod byed dam pa thogs nas// de bzhin
210a10(1): gshegs pa'i dang // 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams la rab tu phul te// mchod pa de yang bas matan dang / ting nge 'dzind 'dzind dar/ pasam tan gyi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i ra pa dang
210a11(1): bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i mthul las mngon par grub pa sha stag go// de ltaran mchod pa phul ba yang // bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir ma yin gyi// sems can tshad myed pa thams cad bla na myed pa'i byang chub la gzhol zhir
210b1(1): yan yon chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir// mchod cing phul bas na// mchod pa des kun du khyab cing // thams cad rab tu tshim par gyur da to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol ba'i 'og tu/

210b11(1): ser sna myed pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi lam la yang dag par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten na mchog tu gyurd cing / mying dang gzugs yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos sku mngon du byed par 'gyur ba dang
211a1(1): rtsi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can rnams kyi zi nad kyis gnond pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
211a2(1): sdig pa can gyi spyod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsngo rnams dang ye shes kyi rgyu mngon par yid ches pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sdums byed pa dang / bdud mang po pham par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i

211b2(1): ngogs myed sobs pa yang // sbyin pa la sgra byung ba yin// sbyin pa la chogs chog gang yin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di skad du// 'di ni dang po byang chub rnams// gnas pa'i gzhi zhes bsngags par
211b3(1): mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' ba nyon 'grus can// sbyin la the tsom myed pa dag/ nges pa'i sems la rab gnas nas// sbyin pa nan tan bsgrub par gyis// sbyin pa'i sems ni gar dag gis// bsod nam
211b4(1): mchog ni rdzogs byed pa// byang chub sems dpa kha sgrub byed na// sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// sbyin pa'i mthu'i stobs kyis ni// rdzu 'phrul mchog ni rdzogs byed pas// zhing ni bye ba bskul byas kyang //

211b6(1): dra bar gyis na// dbang po stobs dang yang zhag dang // yang dag spongadang rdzu 'phrul rkang // bags chags sbeng pa 'drend par byed/ sbyin pa tad pa'i dbang gis ni// rnam dag sgra stan dbang gi sa ni// zhing ni2sh+ya
211b7(1): bya ba brgya phrag tu// dpag myed chos stond 'drend par byed// yosnga su dad pas sbyin btang bas// rdzu 'phrul rnams ni yongs su 'tho ba/ rdzu 'phrus yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// nan tan sbyin pa btar
211b8(1): bar gyis// l+la ni mang po tshad myed rnams// lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po dang // 'khor da rnams kyis ni yongs bsko rang nas// gzhal myed khang mchog rab zhugs te// dbang gis rtse byed pa/ 
211b9(1): 'di la sortogs pa'i rgyal po rnams// sbyin la brtson pa mdzod gyur na// thams cad spangs nas bsu nas ni// bstand pa tir mchod pa dag kyang byed// sbyin pa gtong gar zag gang yin pa// gzin byind chen po phun sum tshogs
211b10(1): shing / rdzu 'phrul stobs la dbang thob pas// lha rgyal rnams ni sdud par byed/ klul bum dang ni gnod sbyin rnams/ thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur/ dri za 'khor bcas rnams kyis kyang
212a1(1): ro lad mo dag gis mchod par byed// chom rkun dag gis byams sems skyed// ma rungs pa rnams ring du 'gro// nor rnams nyams par myi 'gyur da te/ bar mdzad dag ni gang par 'gyur
212a2(1): sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir// tshogs mchog dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes zug par du// mu stogs chos ni spyod myi byed// de la na pa yongs myed de// gzungs rnams yongs su srung
212a3(1): bar byed// khyad par 'phags pa'i stobs rnams kyang // sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin// de ltar sbyin pa gang gtor ba// byang chub lam ni bsgrub par byed// myi dge bshes gnyen phrad myi 'gyur/ spyod mthun
212a4(1): grogs po 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sbyin pa'i tshogs ni stsogs byed pa// pasam gyis myi bya ba gzungs drag dang // shes rab yongs su rdzogs byed pas// tshogs
212a5(1): par 'gyur// tshul khrims dka pa phun tshogs shing // bdud rtsi las rnams spor bar byed// 'dod pa lnga la zhe nad skyed rtsing // gcig yang dag dran pa tshol// sems la rtag tu rmongs
212a6(1): byed pas// 'dod pa dag la sred myi skyed// zhe sdang nyon mongs gang yin pa// yang dag ci bzhin nabu rtogs// skyon yul dag ni thamasu cad la// zhe nad pa myed cing rmongs pa skyed// gang zag des ni nyon mongs rnams/

212a8(1): par gyur// des ni byig zad mthu'i rtswa// yid nab tu rdzogs pas na// mongs pa rnam ma ni yongs spongs nas// myig la myi ngon par zhen gyi rgyu// des ni byig gi skye mtha' dang // sum 'a dang rab tu dben pa dang // 'jug pa dang ni/ 
212a9(1): phyen pa dang // byi skye ba nas nyen no shi par// 'di la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // rab tu rtogs par 'gyur bas na// mongs pa rnams ni yongs spongs nas// myig la mngon par zhen gyi 'gyur// des ni byig ni/
